languages.text: {n}Некоторое время священник молча смотрит на вас, а затем тяжело, словно суставы его превратились в камни, склоняется в поклоне.{/n} "Я еще помню, кто такие {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g}. Владыки и покорители диких секторов пустоты. Крутонравные посланцы {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, несущие весть о Нем во тьму языческую. Не стоит противоречить им, если желаешь носить голову на плечах".

traits.locale_text: {n}Некоторое время священник молча смотрит на вас, а затем тяжело, словно суставы его превратились в камни, склоняется в поклоне.{/n} "Я еще помню, кто такие Вольные Торговцы. Владыки и покорители диких секторов Бездны. Крутонравные посланцы Императора, несущие весть о нем во тьму языческую. Не стоит противоречить им, если желаешь носить голову на плечах".

languages.text: {n}He looks at you in silence for some time, then shifts heavily, as if his joints have turned to stone, to offer you a bow.{/n} "I still remember who {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are. Masters and conquerors of the savage sectors of the void. Short-tempered messengers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} who carry His word into the heathen darkness. Crossing a Rogue Trader is folly if you want to keep your head on your shoulders."
languages.original_text: {n}Некоторое время священник молча смотрит на вас, а затем тяжело, словно суставы его превратились в камни, склоняется в поклоне.{/n} "Я еще помню, кто такие {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g}. Владыки и покорители диких секторов пустоты. Крутонравные посланцы {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, несущие весть о Нем во тьму языческую. Не стоит противоречить им, если желаешь носить голову на плечах".

traits.locale_text: {n}He looks at you in silence for some time, then shifts heavily, as if his joints have turned to stone, to offer you a bow.{/n} "I still remember who Rogue Traders are. Masters and conquerors of the savage sectors of the Void. Short-tempered messengers of the Emperor who carry His word into the darkness of paganism. Crossing them is folly if one wants to keep their head on their shoulders."

Masters and conquerors of the savage sectors of the Void. Short-tempered messengers of the Emperor who carry His word into the darkness of paganism. Crossing them is folly if one wants to keep their head on their shoulders."

Crossing a Rogue Trader is folly if you want to keep your head on your shoulders."

{n}He looks at you in silence for some time, then shifts heavily, as if his joints have turned to stone, to offer you a bow.{/n} "I still remember who Rogue Traders are. Masters and conquerors of the savage sectors of the void. Short-tempered messengers of the Emperor who carry His word into the heathen darkness. Crossing a Rogue Trader is folly if you want to keep your head on your shoulders."

{n}He looks at you in silence for some time, then shifts heavily, as if his joints have turned to stone, to offer you a bow.{/n} "I still remember who {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are. Masters and conquerors of the savage sectors of the void. Short-tempered messengers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} who carry His word into the heathen darkness. Crossing a Rogue Trader is folly if you want to keep your head on your shoulders."

languages.text: {n}他沉默地看了你一会儿，之后重重地晃了晃身子，向你鞠了一躬，仿佛他的关节已经变成了石头。{/n}“我依然记得{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}是怎样的人。他们是虚空之中蛮荒地带的主人与征服者，是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}脾气暴躁的使者，负责将祂的话语带到异端的黑暗之中。如果不想掉脑袋的话，最好不要惹怒行商浪人，因为这恐怕不是什么明智之举。”
languages.original_text: {n}He looks at you in silence for some time, then shifts heavily, as if his joints have turned to stone, to offer you a bow.{/n} "I still remember who {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are. Masters and conquerors of the savage sectors of the void. Short-tempered messengers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} who carry His word into the heathen darkness. Crossing a Rogue Trader is folly if you want to keep your head on your shoulders."

traits.locale_text: {n}他沉默地看了你一会儿，之后重重地晃了晃身子，向你鞠了一躬，仿佛他的关节已经变成了石头。{/n}“我依然记得{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}是怎样的人。他们是虚空之中蛮荒地带的主人与征服者，是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}脾气暴躁的使者，负责将祂的话语带到异端的黑暗之中。如果不想掉脑袋的话，最好不要惹怒行商浪人，因为这恐怕不是什么明智之举。”

languages.text: {n}En silencio, te observa durante unos instantes, y después se mueve con brusquedad. Es como si sus articulaciones se hubieran convertido en piedra. A continuación, te hace una reverencia.{/n} «No olvido quiénes son los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}. Maestros y conquistadores de los sectores más violentos del vacío, mensajeros impacientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} que trasladan Su palabra a la oscuridad pagana. Si queremos conservar la cabeza, no es sensato importunarlos».
languages.original_text: {n}He looks at you in silence for some time, then shifts heavily, as if his joints have turned to stone, to offer you a bow.{/n} "I still remember who {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are. Masters and conquerors of the savage sectors of the void. Short-tempered messengers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} who carry His word into the heathen darkness. Crossing a Rogue Trader is folly if you want to keep your head on your shoulders."

traits.locale_text: {n}En silencio, te observa durante unos instantes, y después se mueve con brusquedad. Es como si sus articulaciones se hubieran convertido en piedra. A continuación, te hace una reverencia.{/n} «No olvido quiénes son los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}. Maestros y conquistadores de los sectores más violentos del vacío, mensajeros impacientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} que trasladan Su palabra a la oscuridad pagana. Si queremos conservar la cabeza, no es sensato importunarlos».

languages.text: {n}彼はしばらく黙ってこちらを見ていたが、関節がこわばったかのように大きく身体を動かし、こちらに頭を下げた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}ですか。虚空の未開の地の支配者であり、征服者。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の言葉を異教徒の闇に運ぶ短気な使者たち。頭を切り落とされたくないのであれば、自由開拓者に逆らうのは控えたほうが良いと言われています」
languages.original_text: {n}He looks at you in silence for some time, then shifts heavily, as if his joints have turned to stone, to offer you a bow.{/n} "I still remember who {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are. Masters and conquerors of the savage sectors of the void. Short-tempered messengers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} who carry His word into the heathen darkness. Crossing a Rogue Trader is folly if you want to keep your head on your shoulders."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はしばらく黙ってこちらを見ていたが、関節がこわばったかのように大きく身体を動かし、こちらに頭を下げた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}ですか。虚空の未開の地の支配者であり、征服者。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の言葉を異教徒の闇に運ぶ短気な使者たち。頭を切り落とされたくないのであれば、自由開拓者に逆らうのは控えたほうが良いと言われています」

languages.text: {n}Er sieht dich eine Weile schweigend an, verlagert dann mühsam sein Gewicht, als wären seine Gelenke zu Stein geworden, und verbeugt sich.{/n} "Ich weiß durchaus noch, was {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} sind. Herrscher und Eroberer der wilden Sektoren der Leere. Leicht reizbare Boten des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, die sein Wort in die heidnische Dunkelheit tragen. Einen Freihändler zu hintergehen, ist dumm, sofern man seinen Kopf auf den Schultern behalten möchte."
languages.original_text: {n}He looks at you in silence for some time, then shifts heavily, as if his joints have turned to stone, to offer you a bow.{/n} "I still remember who {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are. Masters and conquerors of the savage sectors of the void. Short-tempered messengers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} who carry His word into the heathen darkness. Crossing a Rogue Trader is folly if you want to keep your head on your shoulders."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er sieht dich eine Weile schweigend an, verlagert dann mühsam sein Gewicht, als wären seine Gelenke zu Stein geworden, und verbeugt sich.{/n} "Ich weiß durchaus noch, was {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} sind. Herrscher und Eroberer der wilden Sektoren der Leere. Leicht reizbare Boten des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, die sein Wort in die heidnische Dunkelheit tragen. Einen Freihändler zu hintergehen, ist dumm, sofern man seinen Kopf auf den Schultern behalten möchte."

languages.text: {n}Il vous observe en silence pendant un long instant, puis change lourdement de pose, comme si ses articulations s'étaient transformées en pierre, pour s'incliner devant vous.{/n} « Je n'ai pas oublié qui sont les {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g}. Les maîtres et les conquérants des secteurs sauvages de l'espace. Des messagers irascibles de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}, qui font résonner Sa parole dans les ténèbres profanes. Nul ne froisse un libre-marchand sans craindre d'y laisser la vie. »
languages.original_text: {n}He looks at you in silence for some time, then shifts heavily, as if his joints have turned to stone, to offer you a bow.{/n} "I still remember who {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are. Masters and conquerors of the savage sectors of the void. Short-tempered messengers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} who carry His word into the heathen darkness. Crossing a Rogue Trader is folly if you want to keep your head on your shoulders."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous observe en silence pendant un long instant, puis change lourdement de pose, comme si ses articulations s'étaient transformées en pierre, pour s'incliner devant vous.{/n} « Je n'ai pas oublié qui sont les {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g}. Les maîtres et les conquérants des secteurs sauvages de l'espace. Des messagers irascibles de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}, qui font résonner Sa parole dans les ténèbres profanes. Nul ne froisse un libre-marchand sans craindre d'y laisser la vie. »

languages.text: {n}Sana bir süre sessizlik içinde bakıyor, ardından eklemleri taştanmış gibi ağır ağır eğiliyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacirlerin{/g} kim olduğunu unutmadım. Uçsuzun vahşi sektörlerinin efendileri ve fatihlerisiniz. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} öğretilerini karanlığın dinsizliğine taşıyan, çabuk öfkelenen ulaklarsınız. Başın omuzlarının üzerinde kalsın istiyorsan bir Hür Tacir'e zıt gitmemelisin."
languages.original_text: {n}He looks at you in silence for some time, then shifts heavily, as if his joints have turned to stone, to offer you a bow.{/n} "I still remember who {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} are. Masters and conquerors of the savage sectors of the void. Short-tempered messengers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} who carry His word into the heathen darkness. Crossing a Rogue Trader is folly if you want to keep your head on your shoulders."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana bir süre sessizlik içinde bakıyor, ardından eklemleri taşa dönüşmüş gibi ağır ağır dönüyor ve karşında eğiliyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}lerin kim olduğunu hâlâ hatırlıyorum. Uçsuzun acımasız sektörlerinin efendileri ve fatihleri. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un öğretilerini karanlığın dinsizliğine taşıyan, çabuk öfkelenen ulaklar. Başın omuzlarının üzerinde kalsın istiyorsan bir Hür Tacir ile çatışmak akılsızlıktır."
